about.txt.c:
This is a test file.

UpsicronOS v1.0.0

A simple terminal-like operating system interface built with web technologies.

Features:
- File system navigation
- Multiple applications
- Persistent state
- Keyboard-driven interface

test.txt.c:
This is a test file.

UpsicronOS v1.0.0

readme.txt.c:
Welcome to UpsicronOS!

This is a demonstration of a web-based terminal interface.

Navigation:
- Use arrow keys to navigate menus
- Press Enter to select items
- Press Escape to go back
- Use Backspace to navigate up in directories

Applications:
- Calculator: Basic mathematical operations
- Notepad: Simple text editing
- ColorText: Text styling demonstration
- Files: File system browser

The system saves your state automatically, so when you return you'll be right where you left off.

webapp.txt.c:
Web Application Project
=======================

Technologies:
- HTML5 for structure
- CSS3 for styling
- JavaScript for logic
- LocalStorage for persistence

Architecture:
- Modular design with separate classes
- Event-driven input handling
- Component-based UI system
- State management pattern

Next Steps:
- Add more applications
- Improve UI/UX
- Add animations
- Implement themes

game.txt.c:
Terminal Game Project
=====================

Game Concept:
A text-based adventure game set in a terminal environment.

Features to Implement:
- Room navigation system
- Item collection mechanics
- Puzzle solving elements
- Save/load game state
- Multiple endings

Story Ideas:
- Hacker themed adventure
- System administration simulation
- AI consciousness exploration
- Time travel debugging

Technical Considerations:
- Complex state management
- Rich text descriptions
- Interactive command system
- Progress tracking

config.txt.c:
System Configuration
=====================

Display Settings:
- Font size: 24px
- Line height: 24px
- Max lines: Dynamic
- Theme: Terminal green

Performance:
- Update rate: 60 FPS
- Input polling: Active
- State persistence: Enabled
- Debug mode: Disabled

Storage:
- LocalStorage quota: 5MB
- Auto-save interval: On change
- Compression: Disabled
- Encryption: Not implemented
